scripts.start-fs: set REQUEST_LOG_FORMAT=common&set REQUEST_LOG_FILE=access.log&set NOTES_MODEL=models/notes-fs&set DEBUG=note-app:*&npm run start
scripts.start-sequelize-mysql: set REQUEST_LOG_FORMAT=common&set REQUEST_LOG_FILE=access.log&set NOTES_MODEL=models/notes-sequelize&set SEQUELIZE_CONNECT=models/sequelize-mysql.yaml&set DEBUG=note-app:*&npm run start
scripts.start-mongodb: set REQUEST_LOG_FORMAT=common&set REQUEST_LOG_FILE=access.log&set NOTES_MODEL=models/notes-mongodb&set MONGO_URL=mongodb://localhost/chap07&set DEBUG=note-app:*&npm run start
scripts.debug: set REQUEST_LOG_FORMAT=common&&set REQUEST_LOG_FILE=access.log&&set NOTES_MODEL=models/notes-fs&&set DEBUG=note-app:* & npm run start
